cs.umass.edu.myactivitiestoolkit.services

Class SensorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • cs.umass.edu.myactivitiestoolkit.services.SensorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.umass.cs.MHLClient.client.ConnectionStateHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccelerometerService, AudioService, BandService, LocationService, PPGService

    public abstract class SensorService
extends Service
implements edu.umass.cs.MHLClient.client.ConnectionStateHandler
    Base implementation of a foreground sensor service. This includes functionality that is common to all the available services. For instance, the default foreground notification is defined here, but subclasses may override the getNotification() method to define a custom notification; alternatively, subclasses may set the notification properties by overriding getNotificationContentText(), getNotificationIconResourceID() and getNotificationID(). This ensures that the only code required in each concrete implementation is relevant to the corresponding sensors and the service related code can be maintained separately. A sensor service is not instantiable.
    See Also:
    Service, MobileIOClient

        protected void onServiceRestarted()
        Called when the service has been restarted after killed by the OS. Subclasses of SensorService may want to re-register the sensors and start the service in the foreground again or stop the service if this occurs.
